title: Duplicate meal plan constants and utilities across files
description:
MEAL_TYPES, MEAL_TYPE_LABELS, toApiDate, and formatDate are independently defined in both ramekin-ui/src/pages/ViewRecipePage.tsx and ramekin-ui/src/pages/MealPlanPage.tsx. The two toApiDate implementations even have different signatures (ViewRecipePage takes a string, MealPlanPage takes a Date).

Fix: Extract shared constants and utilities into a common module (e.g. utils/mealPlanHelpers.ts) and import from both pages.
